summary: Fully updated Cinematic ENB presets. Morning Star and First Seed editions.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/SRWhKW2.png[/img][/center]


[center][youtube]ZpUipoIssQk[/youtube][youtube]UhzXnZoFXvM[/youtube][/center]

[center] [size=2][color=black] Formerly known as Poupouri - Cinematic ENB [/color][/size] [/center]
[center][url=https://www.facebook.com/beautifulskyrim][size=5] [/size][/url][/center]

[img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3876/14767641739_89b7af255c_b.jpg[/img]


[center][color=white] This is a cinematic ENB preset intended for use with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043//?] ELFX [/url] by anamorfus (Core files (that means interiors) only! DO NOT USE THE ENHANCER! DON'T USE IT! IF YOU ASK IF YOU SHOULD USE THE ENHANCER I WILL NOT RESPOND BECAUSE THIS SHOULD ALREADY BE QUITE CLEAR!) and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12454//?] Dark Dungeons For ENB [/url] by mindflux. This preset is not compatible with Climates Of Tamriel, RLO, or other lighting mods. [/color][/center]


[img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3891/14767765667_4220a4f9a8_b.jpg[/img]


[center][color=white] I made this preset to give Skyrim a more realistically grim, moody, and atmospheric feel.
This ENB was originally intended for personal use but since I have yet to release anything, I thought I would contribute to the nexus community.
I hope that you will enjoy the files I have given you as is.
Maybe leave an endorsement ;)
Cheers. [/color][/center]


[img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3807/14315662622_0a1c40d001_b.jpg[/img]


[center][size=6]Installation[/size]

[size=4]Step 1[/size]
Download the 0.251+ binary file [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]HERE[/url] and extract/drop the wrapper version d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe into your skyrim folder

[size=4]Step 2[/size]
Download the content found in the files section of this page and extract the contents of the corresponding folder to your steam/steamapps/common/skyrim, overwriting any duplicate files.

[size=4]Step 3([b]old versions only!!!![/b])[/size]
Activate the .esp files in either your Skyrim launcher or your Nexus Mod Manager. (No you cannot install this ENB or any other ENB with any mod manager)

[size=4]Step 4[/size]
Set bTreesReceiveShadows to 1, bDrawLandShadows to 1, bShadowsOnGrass to 1, and bFloatPointRenderTarget to 1 in your SkyrimPrefs.ini under [Display].

[size=4]Step 5[/size]
Turn off any anti-aliasing in you skyrim launcher.

[size=4]Step 6[/size]
Enjoy.[/center]

[center][img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5551/14148454994_237f00731b_b.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]https://farm3.staticflickr.com/2843/12781113263_75d1778289_b.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3891/14808870661_20f9b9af80_b.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3890/14881812316_30f86401e9_b.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]https://farm3.staticflickr.com/2899/14310558397_2d4cb47e2f_b.jpg[/img][/center]


[center][size=24][color=grey] Credits [/color][/size][/center]
[center][size=4] Kyokushinoyama [/size][/center]
[center] For his effect, bloom, and sunsprite base files [/center]

[center][size=4] gp65cj04 [/size][/center]
[center] For the DOF file [/center]

[center][size=4] UnrealWarfare [/size][/center]
[center] For his Raindrop file [/center]

[center][size=4] Trilville [/size][/center]
[center] For the palette

[size=4]ZeroKing
[/size]
For the effect shaders[/center]

[center][size=4] A HUGE thanks to Tansarville for all the help with the update <3 [/size][/center]

[center] and of course a big ty to Boris Vorontsov [/center]

As far as permissions go I am not allowing a reupload of any kind. So don't ask. You'd be better off asking any of the greats who gave me permission.
author: MACHIIMACHII
